entry.title: Here is a poem by Ana誰s Nin

link.title: Here is a poem by Ana誰s Nin

entry.content:
And then the day came,
when the risk
to remain tight
in a bud
was more painful
than the risk
it took
to Blossom.

Author: Ana誰s Nin
entry.summary: And then the day came, when the risk to remain tight in a bud was more painful than the risk it took to Blossom. Author: Ana誰s Nin
